content: this is a video tutorial for a beautiful modern looking patchwork crochet stitch the technique used in this stitch is corner to corner but each block has three row this stitch can be worked with a variety of yarns i don t recommend variegated yarns as the design will blend it and won t be visible solid colors and self-striping yarns should work i worked the sample shown in the photos with yarnart begonia yarn category 2 100% mercerized cotton and a steel hook size 1 8 mm you can use this stitch for many crochet projects such as afghans and baby blankets table runners and table clothes tops or cardigans
